item.title: Katacoda Page
item.description: Advanced Microservices Tracing with Jaeger One of the greatest challenges of moving from traditional monolithic application design to a microservices architecture is being able to monitor your business transaction flow—the flow of events via micro service calls throughout your entire system. Business transaction flow—the flow of events via micro service calls throughout your entire system. Burr Sutter Chief Developer Evangelist Introduction to Istio Service Mesh A service mesh provides traffic monitoring, access control, discovery, security, resiliency, and other useful things to a group of services.
